[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat

abbrev omnimath2681_answer : ℕ := sorry
theorem omnimath2681
: IsGreatest {n : ℕ | n > 0 ∧ n ^ 200 < 3 ^ 500} omnimath2681_answer :=
sorry
. Enumerated answers: 3^500 = 36360291795869936842385267079543319118023385026001623040346035832580600191583895484198508262979388783308179702534403855752855931517013066142992430916562025780021771247847643450125342836565813209972590371590152578728008385990139795377610001
